EmailTemplate.description: This template is used when LMT rejects the EOL record
EmailTemplate.name: PCN EOL Rejected Template by LMT
EmailTemplate.subject: PCN EOL Request PCN# {!PCN_EOL__c.PCN_Numbers__c} has been rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!PCN_EOL__c.LastModifiedBy},
Following PCN EOL Request has been rejected.
Please see below comments for rejection. Rejection Comments:{!ApprovalRequest.Comments}
Click this link for more details {!PCN_EOL__c.Link}.
Thank You. Salesforce Admin Team.
